name: Beat Surfer!
description:
Beat Surfer is an absolutely addictive game with the most thrilling and exciting rhythm! You never wanna miss it!

Your goal is to jump to tiles in right color. Move your finger left or right and jump from tile while listening to beats.

A memorable music journey is about to start, let’s rock n roll!

HOW TO PLAY

- Follow the beats and control the moving direction of surfer by tapping the screen.
- Listen to the rhythms and play to the music so that you can get a higher score.
- Move your fingers to experience the thrills of compact rhythms.

KEY FEATURES

- Easy to play, everyone can be the rhythm master
- Addicted rhythm, challenge your friend with a higher score
- Totally free-unlock more mysterious skins
- Thrilling Beats
- Illustrative, Tripping, Bouncy graphic
